criteria.description: Hello, welcome to Miller Vein, this is Jim. Whom do I have the pleasure of speaking with today. Great, Mary. Thank you for calling. How may I help you?
Consistent use of guest's name throughout call
Kept guest informed of of actions
Use of "please, may I and thank you"
I'll be happy to schedule your consultation. In order to do so, I'll need to collect some information from you.  Will that be okay?
Did I address your needs today? Is there anything else I can help you with today?
Use of - This may take a minute, may I please put you on hold while I get you an answer?
May I ask if you were referred by a physician and if so what his or her name is?
How did you hear about us?
Was the referral source recorded in the patient record?
If guest presented an objection, was it effectively overcome?
If guest cancelled, did Teammate try to reschedule?
If guest did not want to reschedule, did teammate attempt to learn why and if we could follow up later?
If guest inquired about Free Evaluation, did Teammate effectively explain the difference between cosmetic (spider veins) and medically complicated varicose veins.
